entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in wind prone areas this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
